    C3D.readc3d — Function.
    readc3d(fn; withmissings=true)

    Read the C3D file fn. Keyword argument withmissings replaces invalid data points with missing values.

    See also: readc3dinfo

    C3D.readc3dinfo — Function.
    readc3dinfo(fn; validate=true)

    Only read the C3D file header and parameters.

    See also: readc3d
